name: CRAZY GUY
description:
CRAZY GUY is the story of a space tramp who travels across worlds with the simple goal of clearing out enemies. You joined a war nomad as he explored a small cluster of enemies on a secret planet.

Together with the nomads, you quickly determined that the planet had been invaded by space terrorists. In each sector, a certain group of enemies with the latest weapons settled down and who knows what plans they have in mind. You have nothing left but to go into a dishonest battle and clean up all the enemies and eliminate their weapons.

Game Features:
• Classic 2D platformer
• Various weapons and enemies
• Nice pixel graphics
